properties.areaDesc: Lauderdale, TN; Tipton, TN; Mississippi, AR
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 4 at 8:29PM CST until January 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for portions of the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Osceola
* from Tuesday January 7 until Friday January 10.
* At 8 PM Saturday the stage was 25.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 28.5 feet on Wednesday January 08.
* Flood stage is 28.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday January 7 and
continue to rise to near 28.5 feet by Wednesday January 08.The
river may fall below flood stage by Friday January 10.
* At 29.0 feet...In Arkansas, water is going over the north side of
Craighead Point. Pumphouse area for the power plant south of
Osceola is flooded. In Tennessee, Lauderdale County Road 924 begins
to flood, isolating a house on Island 34.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
